timeline.message:
Prepopulate Resource Types and Specification Parameters Name Table #1004

- Raise start of sequences to 20000 to support a range of custom
parameter names/codes stored in the db.
- Refactor PopulateResourceTypes to work with multi-tenant or single
tenant stores
- Refactor Main to support both Resource Types and Parameter Names cache

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

Prepopulate Resource Types and Specification Parameters Name Table #1004

- Update to support prepopulation with specific values
- Fixed issues in execute/add batch in the Prepopuation
- Prepopulate ParameterNames and ResourceTypes
- Refactor Main to remove random AddStatic values
- Update to Support Derby and DerbyFhirDatabase and DerbyBootstrapper

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: plenty of space then, for any expansions we need based on sequences
